simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Gain setting Recommended Sensor Field Range +- 1.3 Ga, Gain (LSb/Gauss) 1090, Digital Resoluation (mG/LSb) 0.92.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Gain setting Recommended Sensor Field Range +- 1.9 Ga, Gain (LSb/Gauss) 820, Digital Resoluation (mG/LSb) 1.22.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Gain setting Recommended Sensor Field Range +- 2.5 Ga, Gain (LSb/Gauss) 660, Digital Resoluation (mG/LSb) 1.52.

briefdescription.para: Enable positive bias configuration for X, Y, and Z axes.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: In this configuration, a positive current is forced across the resistive load for all three axes.

briefdescription.para: Enable negative bias configuration for X, Y, and Z axes.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: In this configuration, a negative current is forced across the resistive load for all three axes.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function handles any necessary cleanup prior to application exit.
